articles.title: Shooting at Oslo gay bar leaves at least two people dead
articles.description: At least two people were killed and 10 others wounded after a shooting at an LGBTQ nightclub in Oslo, Norway on Saturday, Reuters reported, citing public broadcaster NRK.
